pht.pack.name: Manic
pht.pack.author: @Hinge
pht.pack.desc.1:
Author - @Hinge
 
Reworks phantoms, adds sanity mechanics,
and adds a handful of new items.

pht.trigger_audio_on: Sanity bar audio settings set to §l[ON]
pht.global_trigger_on: Global sanity bar display and audio set to §l[ON]
